info.name: Kahoot Rainbow Background for Google - 1.2
info.description: The Kahoot Background is added for Google! :D
info.additionalInfo:
Changelog:

1.2 - Increased rainbow speed

1.1 - Fixed issue with style working on other websites
      - Added more colours to the rainbow
      - Fixed flashing colour issue when it went in the purple section
      - Made the colours more vibrant

1.0 - The Kahoot background was born! Includes a white Google logo to fit the theme as well as font colour changes.
